message.body: I am coming this afternoon to get tomatoes,I didn't forget! Did he get shoe on,is he sound?
No and no! :( There was a lot of heat in the foot yesterday and he was extra lame, so I'm hoping I find a blown abscess when I get there this afternoon. I gave him 2 g bute yesterday.
Tanya also suggested taking his temperature for the next few days and I'll start doing that too.
Will do! I think I'll get there around 230, maybe I'll catch you.
Your tomatoes are the best I've had!
